Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket

Class AdrenalineServerSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.AdrenalineServer
      • it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.AdrenalineServerSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdrenalineServer
    public class AdrenalineServerSocket
extends AdrenalineServer
    This class provides the server info and methods that are specific to the Socket type connection. It also inherits the more generic methods by extending AdrenalineServer

      Fields

      private TCPClient client
      reference to the client connected to the server

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AdrenalineServerSocket​(TCPClient client, Controller controller)
      Constructor that assigns the input parameters to their global correspondences and starts the pinging thread that periodically confirms that the connection with the client is still functioning
